REQUEST_OPTION.description: Request helper options for internal requests.

KEEP_ALIVE.description: Add Keep-Alive header to the request connection.

CALENDAR_API_KEY.description: The API Key that the Calendar uses to resolve scopes. This should be removed with SC-3387

CALENDAR_URI.description: The URI to the Calendar Service

CONSENT_AGE_FIRST.description: First gate for consent. Starting at this age the user have to give his/her consent

CONSENT_AGE_SECOND.description: Second gate for consent. Starting at this age parent consent is not required

DISABLED_BRUTE_FORCE_CHECK.description: To disabled the brute force prevention hooks for by authentication.

LOGIN_BLOCK_TIME.description: Time difference for the brute force check in seconds

FORCE_SEND_EMAIL.description: Send mails to mail service, also if not in production mode

FALLBACK_LANGUAGE.description: Value for the fallback language if translation key is not found

SYNC_API_KEY.description: The API Key that the Sync and Mail Cron-Job uses to authenticate itself.This should be removed with SC-3387

TEACHER_VISIBILITY_FOR_EXTERNAL_TEAM_INV.description: defines wheter external team invitation shows teachers from different schools or not. if enabled system wide there are options general enabled or opt-in/-out by user required.

STUDENT_TEAM_CREATION.description: defines wheter students may create teams or not. if enabled system wide there are options general enabled or opt-in/-out by school admin required.

REDIS_URI.description: URL of a Redis server. If undefined, JWT whitelisting and timeouts will be disabled. Format: [redis[s]:]//[[user][:password@]][host][:port][/db-number][?db=db-number[&password=bar[&option=value]]]

PIN_MAX_AGE_SECONDS.description: Maximum time in seconds a generated pin is handled as valid.

JWT_PRIVATE_KEY.description: The private key used to sign JWTs.

JWT_PUBLIC_KEY.description: The public key used to verify JWTs.

JWT_SIGNING_ALGORITHM.description: The algorithm used to sign JWTs. Must be an asymmetric algorithm.

JWT_LIFETIME.description: Lifetime of generated JWTs in days.

JWT_TIMEOUT_SECONDS.description: After this many seconds of inactivity, a user gets logged out automatically. If no REDIS_URI is set, this value is ignored.

FEATURE_JWT_EXTENDED_TIMEOUT_ENABLED.description: Using privateDevice parameter in login, the logout/jwt timeout can be extended to JWT_EXTENDED_TIMEOUT_SECONDS instead of JWT_TIMEOUT_SECONDS.

JWT_EXTENDED_TIMEOUT_SECONDS.description: After this many seconds (default is one month) of inactivity, a user gets logged out when accepted extended login duration. If no REDIS_URI is set, this value is ignored.

TSP_API_ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: The key used to encrypt/decrypt TSP request tokens.

TSP_API_SIGNATURE_KEY.description: The key used to sign/verify TSP request tokens.

TSP_API_CLIENT_TOKEN_LIFETIME_MS.description: The TSP token lifetime in milliseconds.

TSP_SYNC_SCHOOL_LIMIT.description: The amount of schools the sync handles at once.

TSP_SYNC_SCHOOL_DAYS_TO_FETCH.description: The amount of days for which the sync fetches schools from the TSP.

TSP_SYNC_DATA_LIMIT.description: The amount of school data updates the sync handles at once.

TSP_SYNC_DATA_DAYS_TO_FETCH.description: The amount of days for which the sync fetches school data from the TSP.

TSP_SYNC_MIGRATION_LIMIT.description: The amount of users the sync migrates at once.

BLOCK_DISPOSABLE_EMAIL_DOMAINS.description: Prevent use of disposable email addresses.

ADDITIONAL_BLACKLISTED_EMAIL_DOMAINS.description: Add custom domain to the list of blocked domains (comma separated list).

BLOCKLIST_OF_EMAIL_DOMAINS.description: Add custom domain to the list of blocked domains (comma separated list).

FEATURE_TSP_AUTO_CONSENT_ENABLED.description: Feature toggle for automatic consent during TSP sync.

FEATURE_VIDEOCONFERENCE_ENABLED.description: If enabled, adds video conferences to teams and courses.

VIDEOCONFERENCE_DEFAULT_PRESENTATION.description: Link to a custom presentation, if empty, the default presentation will be used.

VIDEOCONFERENCE_HOST.description: The BBB base url (should end without a slash).

VIDEOCONFERENCE_SALT.description: The BBB Salt for api call checksum creation.

NO_COLOR.description: The value is used to disable logging color in terminal and is set in production always to true. It is not connected to the loggers it self.

FILES_STORAGE.description: Files storage server properties, required always to be defined

SERVICE_BASE_URL.description: The URI of the file service

INCOMING_REQUEST_TIMEOUT.description: Timeout for incoming requests to the Files-Storage in milliseconds.

MAX_FILE_SIZE.description: Maximum file size for incoming requests in Byte. We use the Windows convention here that file sizes are measured in KB (1KB = 1024B, instead of 1kB = 1000B). Thus 2,5GB = 2684354560B.

S3_ENDPOINT.description: The URI of the S3 provider

USE_STREAM_TO_ANTIVIRUS.description: send file to antivirus by uploading

FWU_CONTENT.description: Properties of the S3 storage containing FWU content

S3_ENDPOINT.description: The URI of the S3 provider

INCOMING_REQUEST_TIMEOUT_MS.description: Timeout for incoming requests to the fwu-learning-contents in milliseconds.

H5P_EDITOR.description: Properties of the H5P server microservice and library management job

S3_ENDPOINT.description: The URI of the S3 provider

S3_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Access Key to S3_BUCKET_CONTENT with RW and listing buckets permissions

S3_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: Secret key to to S3_BUCKET_CONTENT with RW and listing buckets permissions

LIBRARIES_S3_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Access Key to S3_BUCKET_LIBRARIES (at least read and listing buckets permissions for editor, aditionally write permission for library management)

LIBRARIES_S3_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: Secret key to S3_BUCKET_LIBRARIES (at least read and listing buckets permissions for editor, aditionally write permission for library management)

INCOMING_REQUEST_TIMEOUT.description: Timeout for incoming requests (including file uploads) to the h5p editor in milliseconds .

LIBRARY_LIST_PATH.description: Path to yaml file with list of h5p content type libraries which should be installed

H5P_Library.description: Properties of the H5P server microservice

S3_ENDPOINT.description: The URI of the S3 provider

S3_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Access Key to S3_BUCKET_CONTENT with R/W permissions

S3_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: Secret key to S3_BUCKET_CONTENT with R/W permissions

FEATURE_FWU_CONTENT_ENABLED.description: Defines if backend for the FWU content in the Learnstore is enabled.

FEATURE_H5P_EDITOR_ENABLED.description: Defines if backend for the H5P editor is enabled.

WOPI_MAX_FILE_SIZE.description: The maximum file size in bytes that can be handled by the WOPI API. Download of larger files throws an error.

FEATURE_IDENTITY_MANAGEMENT_ENABLED.description: Enables the Identity Management (ErWIn IDM) feature. Determines if Keycloak related modules will be loaded during startup. Prerequisite to set further FEATURE_IDENTITY_MANAGEMENT_X flags

FEATURE_IDENTITY_MANAGEMENT_STORE_ENABLE.description: Enables the Identity Management (ErWIn IDM) as account storage. If activated, account related create, update and delete operations are mirrored into Keycloak. Prerequisite to set FEATURE_IDENTITY_MANAGEMENT_LOGIN_ENABLED flag.

FEATURE_IDENTITY_MANAGEMENT_LOGIN_ENABLE.description: Enables the login via Keycloak with the Identity Management (ErWIn IDM) for users managed by dBildungscloud. If activated, Keycloak will be used as the primary source to read for the dBildungscloud login.

INTERNAL_URI.description: The ErWIn IDM base URI for Kubernetes cluster internal use.

EXTERNAL_URI.description: The ErWIn IDM base URI for Kubernetes cluster external use.

OIDCMOCK.description: OpenID Connect Identity Provider mock server for develop and testing purpose (set these values for local seeding purpose).

CLIENT_ID.description: The mock server accepted client id.

CLIENT_SECRET.description: The mock server accepted client's secret.

SERVICE_HOSTNAME.description: IP of host to connect to TCP interface

SERVICE_PORT.description: Port of host to use when connecting via TCP interface

RABBITMQ_URI.description: The URI of the RabbitMQ server.

RABBITMQ_GLOBAL_PREFETCH_COUNT.description: The global prefetch count of the RabbitMQ server.

LEGACY_RABBITMQ_GLOBAL_PREFETCH_COUNT.description: deprecated from the start, PLEASE GET YOUR OWN CONFIG, prefetch count is applied per channel globally for all legacy rabbitmq channels (nest based code is not affected)

HOST.description: The client url (should end without a slash).

API_HOST.description: The server endpoint, for external calls like Antivirus service. When called from docker container, can be http://host.docker.internal:3030

PUBLIC_BACKEND_URL.description: The server api url that is accessible from the web (should end without a slash).

ALERT_STATUS_URL.description: The url of status message provider (should end without a slash).

FEATURE_MULTIPLE_S3_PROVIDERS_ENABLED.description: Enables using the storage provider collection to determine a provider with free buckets upon school creation. If disabled, the only storage provider is configured via the environment variables in config/secrets.js

S3_KEY.description: Synchronous encryption key used to secure storage provider secrets. Only used with FEATURE_MULTIPLE_S3_PROVIDERS_ENABLED=true

FEATURE_S3_BUCKET_CORS.description: true if CORS is supported by the S3 bucket. (Minio does not support it)

REQUEST_LIMIT_STORAGE_PROVIDER.description: Number of objects that can be modified in one request to the storage provider. Must not exceed 1000.

STORAGE_SIGNED_URL_EXPIRE.description: Expiration time in seconds for signedUrl used by antivirus

FILE_SECURITY_CHECK_MAX_FILE_SIZE.description: Maximum file size for antivirus check in Byte.

FILE_SECURITY_CHECK_SERVICE_URI.description: Antivirus file endpoint, only used for legacy file implementation

FILE_SECURITY_SERVICE_USERNAME.description: Username for the antivirus service, only used for legacy file implementation

FILE_SECURITY_SERVICE_PASSWORD.description: Password for the antivirus service, only used for legacy file implementation

SC_SHORTNAME.description: The sort name of the instance (dbc, nbc, brb, thr).

FEATURE_LOGIN_LINK_ENABLED.description: Login via Link generation (to the right form).

FEATURE_SCHOOL_SANIS_USER_MIGRATION_ENAB.description: Enables the oauth system (iserv to sanis) migration feature.

MIGRATION_END_GRACE_PERIOD_MS.description: Grace period before school admin cannot restart oauth migration anymore. Value is given in ms and default is 7 days

FEATURE_SANIS_GROUP_PROVISIONING_ENABLED.description: Groups of type class also gets provisioned, when provisioning a user via oauth login.

TRAINING_URL.description: URL for the platform training material

FEATURE_ADMIN_TOGGLE_STUDENT_LERNSTORE_V.description: Allows school admin to toggle student's LERNSTORE_VIEW permission.

IS_CONFIGURABLE.description: Allows school admin to toggle teachers' STUDENT_LIST permission.

IS_ENABLED_BY_DEFAULT.description: Grants teachers STUDENT_LIST permission by default.

IS_VISIBLE.description: Defines whether feature toggle for visibility of students to teachers is visible.

FEATURE_SCHOOL_POLICY_ENABLED.description: Enables uploading of school specific Privacy Policy on old admin page

FEATURE_SCHOOL_POLICY_ENABLED_NEW.description: Enables uploading of school specific Privacy Policy on new admin page.

FEATURE_SCHOOL_TERMS_OF_USE_ENABLED.description: Enables uploading of school specific Terms of Use on new admin page.

ROCKETCHAT_SERVICE_ENABLED.description: Enables chat function for the school.

LDAP_PASSWORD_ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: Synchronous encryption key used to secure search user passwords

AES_KEY.description: Symmetric encryption key used to encrypt and decrypt secrets.

API_KEY.description: The etherpad api key for sending requests.

COOKIE_EXPIRES_SECONDS.description: Number of seconds after an etherpad cookie expires.

COOKIE_RELEASE_THRESHOLD.description: If Session Valid time is smaller than this, a new session is created on request.

NEXTCLOUD_SOCIALLOGIN_OIDC_INTERNAL_NAME.description: Internal name of schulcloud oidc provider of nextcloud's social login app

COLLABORATIVE_STORAGE_PROVIDER.description: Selects the storage provider strategy for the collaborative storage

SKIP_CONDITIONS_CONSENT.description: A string with concatenated user types (student, employee) that don't need to explicitly state their consent with the terms and conditions. "employee" means teachers and admins.

ACTIVATION_LINK_PERIOD_OF_VALIDITY_SECON.description: The time in seconds during which the activation link is valid. After expiration the entry is removed from the database

ADMIN_MAIL_RECEIVERS.description: A string that contains recievers of the daily stat and other mails. Can contain mutliple mails, seperated by comma

FEATURE_LERNSTORE_ENABLED.description: Defines if backend for the Lern-Store Edu-Sharing is enabled.

ES_DOMAIN.description: The URL for the edu-sharing repository.

ES_USER.description: The username for edu-sharing api access

ES_PASSWORD.description: The password for edu-sharing api access

FEATURE_ES_MERLIN_ENABLED.description: When enabled, the merlin referene will generate a valid url

SECRET_ES_MERLIN_USERNAME.description: The username for Merlin login, used for edusharing

SECRET_ES_MERLIN_PW.description: The password for Merlin login, used for edusharing

SECRET_ES_MERLIN_COUNTIES_CREDENTIALS.description: JSON stringified with credentials for merlin counties, used by Lern-Store

FEATURE_ES_SEARCHABLE_ENABLED.description: When enabled, only content having searchable flag will be returned by Lern-Store

FEATURE_ES_COLLECTIONS_ENABLED.description: When enabled, collections will be searchable in Lern-Store

SILENT_ERROR_ENABLED.description: Brute force flag during recovery password process

FEATURE_API_VALIDATION_ENABLED.description: when enabled, all incoming requests are validated against the openapi schemata, unless the route is whitelisted.

FEATURE_API_RESPONSE_VALIDATION_ENABLED.description: when enabled, all incoming requests are validated against the openapi schemata, unless the route is whitelisted.

API_VALIDATION_WHITELIST_EXTENSION.description: when set, this is interpreted as a regex to extend the ignorelist for the API validation with any routes matching the regex.

FEATURE_PROMETHEUS_METRICS_ENABLED.description: Feature flag for collecting and exporting Prometheus metrics.

PROMETHEUS_METRICS_ROUTE.description: Route at which Prometheus metrics are exported (if enabled by the feature flag).

PROMETHEUS_METRICS_PORT.description: Port number on which the additional server (that exports Prometheus metrics) is listening on (if enabled by the feature flag). Please remember that it must be different than the main app listening port as the Prometheus app server will run on a different port and you can't run two servers on the same port.

PROMETHEUS_METRICS_COLLECT_DEFAULT_METRI.description: Toggle that enables/disables collecting default Prometheus client metrics (e.g. NodeJS or OS-related ones).

PROMETHEUS_METRICS_COLLECT_METRICS_ROUTE.description: Toggle that enables/disables collecting metrics of the metrics route itself (like metrics route calls count or response time).

FEATURE_MONGOOSE_LOGGING_ENABLED.description: Enable logging for mongoose database calls.

INCOMING_REQUEST_TIMEOUT_API.description: Timeout for incoming requests to the API in milliseconds.

INCOMING_REQUEST_TIMEOUT_COPY_API.description: Timeout for incoming requests to the copy API in milliseconds.

FEATURE_SYNC_LAST_SYNCED_AT_ENABLED.description: Enable setting/updating user's document lastSyncedAt field, e.g. in the LDAP sync process

FEATURE_SYNCER_CONSUMER_ENABLE.description: Enable consumer for queued sync messages

LDAP_SYSTEM_SYNCER_POOL_SIZE.description: Determines how many system syncers will be run in parallel (at most) during the LDAP sync.

LDAP_SCHOOL_SYNCER_POOL_SIZE.description: Determines how many school syncers will be run in parallel (at most) during the LDAP sync.

SYNC_LOG_LEVEL.description: Log level for queue based syncers (e.g. LDAP)

NEST_LOG_LEVEL.description: Nest Log level for api. The http flag is for request logging. The http flag do only work by api methods with added 'request logging interceptor'.

EXIT_ON_ERROR.description: By default, the application is terminated after an uncaughtException has been logged. If this is not the desired behavior, set exitOnError to false.

MAIL_SEND_ROUTING_KEY.description: Routing key name for mail sending

MEMORY_INTERVAL_TIME.description: Is the time for logging memory metrics to log in >secounds<. Default 0 will disable the logging.

REQUEST_LOGGING_ENABLED.description: Enabled that every request is logged with the information route and method

SUPPORT_PROBLEM_EMAIL_ADDRESS.description: Email address used for reporting a problem

SUPPORT_WISH_EMAIL_ADDRESS.description: Email addresses used for reporting a wish

JWT_SHOW_TIMEOUT_WARNING_SECONDS.description: Determines the time in seconds to show the timeout warning in the client

FEATURE_EXTENSIONS_ENABLED.description: Enables user's use of extensions in the client

FEATURE_TEAMS_ENABLED.description: Enables user's use of the teams feature in the client

NOT_AUTHENTICATED_REDIRECT_URL.description: Determines the url to be redirected to when the user is not authenticated

FEATURE_COLUMN_BOARD_ENABLED.description: Toggle for activating the column board.

FEATURE_COLUMN_BOARD_COLLABORATIVE_TEXT_.description: Enable collaborative text editor in column board.

FEATURE_COLUMN_BOARD_LINK_ELEMENT_ENABLE.description: Enable link elements in column board.

FEATURE_COLUMN_BOARD_VIDEOCONFERENCE_ENA.description: Enable video conference elements in column board.

COLUMN_BOARD_HELP_LINK.description: link to userfacing documentation of the column board feature

COLUMN_BOARD_FEEDBACK_LINK.description: link to a page that gathers feedback about the column board feature

FEATURE_TASK_SHARE.description: Toggle for the task sharing feature.

FEATURE_COLUMN_BOARD_SHARE.description: Toggle for the column board sharing feature.

FEATURE_COLUMN_BOARD_SOCKET_ENABLED.description: Toggle for the column board web socket feature.

FEATURE_BOARD_LAYOUT_ENABLED.description: Toggle for the column board layout feature.

FEATURE_USER_MIGRATION_ENABLED.description: Enable user migration page for admin to bind ldap accounts to local accounts

FEATURE_USER_MIGRATION_SYSTEM_ID.description: SystemId for migration of users from system. To use this please set FEATURE_USER_MIGRATION_CENTRAL_LDAP in the client

IMPORTUSER_SAVE_ALL_MATCHES_REQUEST_TIME.description: Timeout in milliseconds for saving all import user matches

FEATURE_COMMON_CARTRIDGE_COURSE_EXPORT_E.description: Toggle for the IMSCC course download feature.

FEATURE_COMMON_CARTRIDGE_COURSE_IMPORT_E.description: Toggle for the Common Cartridge course import feature.

FEATURE_COMMON_CARTRIDGE_COURSE_IMPORT_M.description: The maximum file upload size in bytes for the Common Cartridge file during import.

GHOST_BASE_URL.description: Base URL of ghost blog (should end without a slash)

FEATURE_CONSENT_NECESSARY.description: Determines if consent is necessary during registration.

COOKIE.description: Cookie properties, required always to be defined

SAME_SITE.description: Value for cookies sameSite property. When SECURE flag is false, 'None' is not allowed in SAME_SITE and Lax should be used as default instead

FEATURE_ALLOW_INSECURE_LDAP_URL_ENABLED.description: Enables feature that allows the insecure LDAP URL (with ldap:// protocol).

ADMIN_API.description: Configuration of the schulcloud-server's admin API.

ENABLED.description: Flag to turn on/off the Admin API.

PORT.description: Port of the exposed Admin API server.

ALLOWED_API_KEYS.description: Allowed Admin API keys (for accessing the Admin API). - A comma seperated list of strings where description is optional e.g. [<description>:]<token>,[<description>:]<token>

DELETION_DELETE_AFTER_MINUTES.description: threshold in minutes, after which a deletion request can be processed

DELETION_MODIFICATION_THRESHOLD_MS.description: threshold in milliseconds to try again to process a hanging Pending or Failed deletion requests

DELETION_CONSIDER_FAILED_AFTER_MS.description: threshold in milliseconds to stop trying to process Pending or Failed deletion requests

DELETION_MAX_CONCURRENT_DELETION_REQUEST.description: max amount of deletion requests to be processed simultaneously

DELETION_DELAY_MILLISECONDS.description: delay in milliseconds to sleep before processing another batch of deletion requests

FEATURE_NEW_SCHOOL_ADMINISTRATION_PAGE_A.description: Makes the new school administration page the default page

FEATURE_SHOW_OUTDATED_USERS.description: This feature flag controls whether the outdated user accounts are displayed or not. After a migration, all user accounts which were not migrated will be marked as outdated.

FEATURE_ENABLE_LDAP_SYNC_DURING_MIGRATIO.description: Displays the school-feature switch ENABLE_LDAP_SYNC_DURING_MIGRATION on the school-settings page.

FEATURE_CTL_CONTEXT_CONFIGURATION_ENABLE.description: Enables the configuration of custom parameters for context external tools

FEATURE_COLUMN_BOARD_EXTERNAL_TOOLS_ENAB.description: Enables external tools on the column board

FEATURE_PREFERRED_CTL_TOOLS_ENABLED.description: Enables preferred external tools on the column board

EXTERNAL_TOOL_MAX_LOGO_SIZE_IN_BYTES.description: Maximum size of the logo of an external tool in bytes

PREFERRED_TOOLS_LIMIT.description: Maximum number of preferred tools that can be set

FEATURE_SHOW_NEW_CLASS_VIEW_ENABLED.description: Enables the new class list view

FEATURE_SHOW_NEW_ROOMS_VIEW_ENABLED.description: Enables the new course list view

FEATURE_GROUPS_IN_COURSE_ENABLED.description: Enables groups of type class in courses

FEATURE_COMPUTE_TOOL_STATUS_WITHOUT_VERS.description: Enables the calculation of the outdated status of an external tool without the usage of the db attribute version

FEATURE_CTL_TOOLS_COPY_ENABLED.description: Enables the copying of ctl tools when copying a course.

CTL_TOOLS_RELOAD_TIME_MS.description: Sets the time before launch request data is called again from server

FEATURE_SHOW_MIGRATION_WIZARD.description: Enables the migration wizard on the school administration page in the migration section.

MIGRATION_WIZARD_DOCUMENTATION_LINK.description: The documentation page that gets rendered in the migration wizard tool.

STUDENTS_TEACHERS_CLASSES_LIMIT.description: Number of simultaneously synchronized students, teachers and classes

ADMIN_API_CLIENT.description: Configuration of the schulcloud-server's admin API client.

BASE_URL.description: Base URL of the Admin API.

API_KEY.description: API key for accessing the Admin API.

TLDRAW_ADMIN_API_CLIENT.description: Configuration of the Tldraw's Admin API client.

BASE_URL.description: Base URL of the Tldraw's Admin API.

API_KEY.description: API key for accessing the Tldraw's Admin API.

SCHULCONNEX_CLIENT.description: Configuration of the schulcloud's schulconnex client.

API_URL.description: Base URL of the schulconnex API (from dof)

TOKEN_ENDPOINT.description: Token endpoint of the schulconnex API (from dof)

CLIENT_ID.description: Client ID for accessing the schulconnex API (from server vault)

CLIENT_SECRET.description: Client secret for accessing the schulconnex API (from server vault)

PERSON_INFO_TIMEOUT_IN_MS.description: Timeout in milliseconds for fetching person info from schulconnex

PERSONEN_INFO_TIMEOUT_IN_MS.description: Timeout in milliseconds for fetching personen info from schulconnex

POLICIES_INFO_TIMEOUT_IN_MS.description: Timeout in milliseconds for fetching policies info from schulconnex

HOSTNAME.description: Hostname. Should usually not be defined as it's expected to be taken from the process env.

HEALTH_CHECKS_EXCLUDE_MONGODB.description: Toggle that, when enabled, excludes MongoDB from the health checks.

FEATURE_SCHULCONNEX_COURSE_SYNC_ENABLED.description: Enables the synchronization of courses with linked groups during provisioning.

FEATURE_MIGRATION_WIZARD_WITH_USER_LOGIN.description: Enables the migration wizard to use the user login migration process

FEATURE_OTHER_GROUPUSERS_PROVISIONING_EN.description: Enables the provisioning of other groupusers

FEATURE_SCHULCONNEX_MEDIA_LICENSE_ENABLE.description: Enables the storing and checking media license of users

PROVISIONING_SCHULCONNEX_POLICIES_INFO_U.description: URL for fetching policies info from moin.schule schulconnex

PROVISIONING_SCHULCONNEX_GROUP_USERS_LIM.description: Maximum number of users in group that still get processed during schulconnex provisioning

PROVISIONING_SCHULCONNEX_EXCHANGE.description: rabbitmq exchange name for schulconnex provisioning

BOARD_COLLABORATION_URI.description: URL for connecting to the WebSocketServer

FEATURE_ROOMS_CHANGE_PERMISSIONS_ENABLED.description: Enables the ability to change permissions of room members

FEATURE_EXTERNAL_SYSTEM_LOGOUT_ENABLED.description: Enables the external system logout feature

ENABLE_SYNC_LEGACY_INDEXES_VIA_FEATHERS_.description: if calling sync legacy indexes is allowed, only management module should have access to this, this should not exist in the long term when all entites and their indexes have been migrated
